verb.description: Knock or hit (something) so as to cause a reverberating sound.
examples: he bonked his head on the plane's low bulkhead

verb.description: (of a cyclist or runner) reach a point of exhaustion that makes one unable to go further.
examples: I bonked and couldn't pedal another stroke

noun.description: An act of knocking or hitting something that causes a reverberating sound.
examples: give it a bonk with a hammer

noun.description: A level of exhaustion that makes a cyclist or runner unable to go further.
examples: we had the bonk when we were saddle sore
